DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether EP-4 receptor antagonist prevent headache expect Prostaglandin E2 infusion .
DOC.brief_title: EP4-receptor Antagonism Prostaglandin E2 ( PGE2 ) Human Headache Model
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Tension headache All primary form headache Cardiovascular , Central Nervous system ( CNS ) autoimmune diseases Gastrointestinal disease Previous clinical sign mental illness substance abuse . Participation clinical study medicinal product without regulatory approval marketing authorisation within 1 month prior trial Pregnancy/nursing Daily intake medication ( except oral contraceptive )
